__about__: This file provides stubs for dynamic variables used in HTTP Client
This file serves a documentation purpose and should not be modified manually
Values of this variables are generated at the runtime

uuid.description: This dynamic variable generates a new UUID-v4

timestamp.description: This dynamic variable generates the current Unix timestamp

isoTimestamp.description: This dynamic variable generates the current timestamp in ISO 8601 format for UTC timezone

randomInt.description: This dynamic variable generates a random integer between 0 and 1000

placeholder.description: This dynamic variable marks some segment, that should be replaced by user. Usually tooling adds this variable, when some URL path cannot be recognized.

exampleServer.description: This dynamic variable provides address for a local example server for playing with HTTP Client request

integer.description: This dynamic variable generates random integer

from.description: Lower bound for a random integer (inclusive)

to.description: Upper bound for a random integer (exclusive)

overloading.description: This version generates integer between `from` and `to`

to.description: Upper bound for a random integer (exclusive)

overloading.description: This version generates integer between 0 and `to`
This version generates integer between 0 and 1000 (inclusive)

float.description: This dynamic variable generates random float

from.description: Lower bound for a random float (inclusive)

to.description: Upper bound for a random float (exclusive)

overloading.description: This version generates float between `from` and `to`

to.description: Upper bound for a random float (exclusive)

overloading.description: This version generates float between 0 and `to`
This version generates float between 0 and 1000 (inclusive)

alphanumeric.description: This dynamic variable generates random sequence of letters, digits and `_` of length `length`

length.description: Length of the generated string. Should be greater than 0

alphabetic.description: This dynamic variable generates random sequence of uppercase and lowercase letters of length `length`

length.description: Length of the generated string. Should be greater than 0

hexadecimal.description: This dynamic variable generates random hexadecimal string of length `length`

length.description: Length of generated hexadecimal string. Should be greater than 0

email.description: This dynamic variable generates random email address

uuid.description: This dynamic variable generates a new UUID-v4
